{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What we do"}
We promote good urban design practice in London. We're helping to implement the Mayor's Good Growth by Design programme through our activities.
Our team of architects, urban designers and heritage experts provide specialist services to us, the Greater London Authority (GLA) and London boroughs .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Our responsibilities"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Support the delivery of world-class streets and spaces, providing design and \u003ca href=\"/info-for/urban-planning-and-construction/urban-design/heritage-advice\"\u003eheritage advice\u003c/a\u003e for Crossrail 2 and new river crossings","Advise on public space schemes by consultants, boroughs or developers and advise on how they can be improved","Design public space schemes, focusing on the needs of those who will use and look after places and spaces","Provide urban design services to major transport infrastructure projects","Help create planning frameworks and area strategies using high quality documents that tackle complex design issues, approaches, principles, requirements and parameters for future work","Assess planning applications and emerging policy documents, considering the design and heritage credentials of streets and \u003ca href=\"/info-for/urban-planning-and-construction/planning-applications/interchange\"\u003einterchanges\u003c/a\u003e ","Provide historic conservation advice and input","Support our \u003ca href=\"/info-for/urban-planning-and-construction/planning-applications/pre-application-services\"\u003epre-application services\u003c/a\u003e and development planning function","Design guidance, case studies and research","Support the GLA's Good Growth by Design programme"]}
We also work with Urban Design London . They provide training, network events and design review services.

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Royal Docks Local Transport Design Guidance"}

We've been working with the GLA and London Borough of Newham to produce the Royal Docks Local Transport Design Guidance. This outlines our shared goal to create significant improvements to both the movement and place function of streets and spaces in the Royal Docks Opportunity Area.

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Small Change, Big Impact"}
Small Change, Big Impact is a practical guide to producing temporary, light touch and low-cost projects to change the way a street looks and feels. It forms part of our Healthy Streets Approach .
